str2: All, the whole, altogether. Absolutely all or every one.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I amaze; pass: I am amazed (almost terrified). From thambos; to stupefy, i.e. Astound.
So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.
To seek together, discuss, dispute. From sun and zeteo; to investigate jointly, i.e. Discuss, controvert, cavil.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: Himself, herself, itself.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
This; he, she, it.
Fresh, new, unused, novel. Of uncertain affinity; new
Teaching, doctrine, what is taught. From didasko; instruction.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
From exesti; privilege, i.e. force, capacity, competency, freedom, or mastery, delegated influence.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To give order, command, charge. From epi and tasso; to arrange upon, i.e. Order.
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Unclean, impure. Impure (lewd) or specially, (demonic).
Wind, breath, spirit.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From hupo and akouo; to hear under, i.e. To listen attentively; by implication, to heed or conform to a command or authority.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
